text: Location of Medzilaborce District in the Prešov Region. Oľka is a village and municipality in the Medzilaborce District in the Prešov Region of far north- eastern Slovakia. ==History== In historical records the village was first mentioned in 1408. ==Geography== The municipality lies at an altitude of 250 metres and covers an area of 31.459 km². It has a population of about 350 people. ==External links== *http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html Category:Villages and municipalities in Medzilaborce District
title: Oľka
